transcript.text:
￼















Webstore Personalization

4 min
after a successful store setup with onprintshop, you may want to personalize your store or make some settings as per your business requirement such as creating the product page layout, website theme, links, etc watch to learn how you can configure and personalize your store store configuration store configuration learn to configure and customize your website as desired using our handy features product page layout product page layout learn to create layouts for specific products or product groups using customization setup header & footer links setup header & footer links learn to customize and manage your website's header and footer link setup the sidebar setup the sidebar understand the concept, working, and management of sidebar, and sidebar widget create promotional message create promotional message learn how to promote specific announcements, messages, or offers using a message content management system content management system learn to create new content pages, set their links and more content page & links content page & links learn to create and manage various content pages and links, and external links upload banners on website upload banners on website learn to customize your website with banners, upload, customize, and more
Did this page help you?
